== Kottappuram (CT) (627765) ==

== Demography & Population ==

Kottappuram (CT) is a town in the [[Talappilly]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 6.65 sq. km. and harbouring 1655 households with total population of 6727 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Thrissur]] is at a distance of 25 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 325 km. Male population is 3258 and female population is 3469. Scheduled Caste population is 849 and Scheduled Tribes population is 2. Census Location Code of the town is 627765<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class V (Population 5,000 to 9,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Thrissur (m corp.) at a distance of 25 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kochi (m corp. + og)  at a distance of 105 km. Railway station is at Wadakkanchery at a distance of 15 km.
